faq.question: How can I turn my XSPs into Generators to get better performance?

answer.p: Cocoon will compile your XSP files into Java classes the first time they are requested. You can find them in your work directory, for example in tomcat/work/.../org/apache/cocoon/www/my_xsp.class.
